sections.heading: Definitions.Section 12-1-102 - Application of Provisions.
Application of Provisions.
sections.text:
12-1-102. Application of provisions.

(a) The general control and regulatory provisions of this title apply to all licenses and permits authorized under this title, unless otherwise provided.

(b) Nothing in this title prohibits a liquor supplier operating under a governmental permit or tax license from selling his product to the division or delivering products at points not within the state of Wyoming after licenses are secured as required by the division.
